title: All of Sudden, Every Cool Girl Has This Rich-Looking Jacket in Her Closet
description: The luxurious texture simply screams old money.
excerpt: Want to elevate your jacket game this season? The best suede blazers will do the trick. Here, shop 15 best options around.
text: The All-Star FindMadewell The Kline BlazerIf you’re looking for a blazer with a modern fit, Madewell’s design has slightly dropped shoulders and a subtle oversized fit that will be a compliment magnet.Customer review: “I have been on the hunt for a suede blazer which will stand the test of time. After much online research, I settled on this beautiful find. The quality is stellar, beautiful rich autumnal chestnut color, classic styling, very versatile with lot of styling potential for a multitude of looks. I was able to go try in store and settled on a 4 rather than my usual 6, I would say this is a roomy fit, not enormous but generous and even sizing down retained the oversized slouch lux look. Price point is excellent considering most similar suede blazers run closer to a thousand dollars. This was my first purchase at Madewell, and I was so impressed. I will be looking for more great finds in the future I am sure!”The French Girl EssentialSézane Will JacketChannel the always sophisticated yet effortless ease of French girl fashion with help from the Paris-based brand Sézane. This option comes in a loose-fitting silhouette, so it’s perfect for layering over shirts and sweaters.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Vintage-Inspired MarvelStaud Corrine JacketWith strong shoulders and a notched lapel, Staud’s take on the leather blazer feels like a refreshing update of the ’80s trend.The Editor’s FavoritePrada Suede BlazerFor something fresh off the runway, turn to Prada’s coveted brown suede blazer. The best part about this investment-worthy find is that there are a million ways to wear it: with jeans, a mini dress, or a little skirt, to name a few.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Chic StaplePixie Market Genuine-Leather Suede BlazerYou’ll need to move quickly to score Pixie Market’s brown suede blazer. It’s a bestseller that, unsurprisingly, constantly sells out. It stands out from the pack, thanks to oversized pockets and its much more affordable price point.The Office-Ready OptionVeronica Beard Duane Suede BlazerFor a timeless silhouette that can also be added to your work wardrobe, count on Veronica Beard. What’s even better is the impeccable fit, which elongates and accentuates the waist.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Unique TakeMimchik Pinched BlazerThere’s no need for multiple buttons. This stunner comes with a single clasp that’s just as chic as other jackets.The Affordable HeroDolan Left Coast Faux-Suede Boyfriend Blazer JacketYour search for a really good faux suede option stops here. This boyfriend blazer has the cool-girl structure that we love in a timeless chocolate hue.Customer review: “So happy this jacket is in my closet! It’s soft and the color is to die for. The easiest thing to throw on and look like a fall queen. I paired it with a white tank, black shorts, and black knee-high Western-inspired boots and got endless compliments. Get it!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Investment-Worthy FindWeekend Max Mara Oversized Suede JacketIf everyday elegance is what you’re after, Weekend Max Mara nails it with a drop-shoulder blazer. The luxe suede is made from 100 percent goat leather and will be the hero in your fall and winter wardrobe.The Dressy DetailsGeneration Love Arielle Vegan Suede BlazerWant a little ritz and glitz? Generation Love topped off its suede blazer with gold-trimmed buttons for a touch of glam.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Belted Beauty& Other Stories Belted Suede JacketWith it’s cropped finish and dramatically long belt, this suede jacket will make a statement in any closet.The Boxy SilhouetteL’Agence Aimee Relaxed Fit Double Breasted Suede BlazerThat borrowed from the boys, oversized look is still going strong, and L’Agence has mastered it with this brown suede blazer. Balance out the roomy fit with a pair of body-hugging leggings or straight-leg jeans.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Short & SweetMassimo Dutti Short Suede Leather Jacket With Pocket DetailsOne of the biggest trends in tops is this slightly shortened silhouette that stops right at the hips. Massimo Dutti proved how chic the cropped length can be with its take on the suede jacket. The Ladylike JacketReformation Veda Reed Leather JacketNo collar? No problem. Forget the lapel and grab this ladylike silhouette to wear with your favorite jeans, skirts, and trousers.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Oversized CoolnessDucie Magda Suede JacketWhile it’s not exactly a blazer, you can’t deny the coolness of Ducie’s oversized jacket. Zoom in and you’ll see that the tough leather collar offers a chic contrast next to the smooth suede sleeves, like a chic take on the season’s other outerwear piece of the moment: the barn jacket.Why Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
html:
The All-Star Find

Madewell The Kline Blazer

If you’re looking for a blazer with a modern fit, Madewell’s design has slightly dropped shoulders and a subtle oversized fit that will be a compliment magnet.

Customer review: “I have been on the hunt for a suede blazer which will stand the test of time. After much online research, I settled on this beautiful find. The quality is stellar, beautiful rich autumnal chestnut color, classic styling, very versatile with lot of styling potential for a multitude of looks. I was able to go try in store and settled on a 4 rather than my usual 6, I would say this is a roomy fit, not enormous but generous and even sizing down retained the oversized slouch lux look. Price point is excellent considering most similar suede blazers run closer to a thousand dollars. This was my first purchase at Madewell, and I was so impressed. I will be looking for more great finds in the future I am sure!”

The French Girl Essential

Sézane Will Jacket

Channel the always sophisticated yet effortless ease of French girl fashion with help from the Paris-based brand Sézane. This option comes in a loose-fitting silhouette, so it’s perfect for layering over shirts and sweaters.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Vintage-Inspired Marvel

Staud Corrine Jacket

With strong shoulders and a notched lapel, Staud’s take on the leather blazer feels like a refreshing update of the ’80s trend.

The Editor’s Favorite

Prada Suede Blazer

For something fresh off the runway, turn to Prada’s coveted brown suede blazer. The best part about this investment-worthy find is that there are a million ways to wear it: with jeans, a mini dress, or a little skirt, to name a few.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Chic Staple

Pixie Market Genuine-Leather Suede Blazer

You’ll need to move quickly to score Pixie Market’s brown suede blazer. It’s a bestseller that, unsurprisingly, constantly sells out. It stands out from the pack, thanks to oversized pockets and its much more affordable price point.

The Office-Ready Option

Veronica Beard Duane Suede Blazer

For a timeless silhouette that can also be added to your work wardrobe, count on Veronica Beard. What’s even better is the impeccable fit, which elongates and accentuates the waist.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Unique Take

Mimchik Pinched Blazer

There’s no need for multiple buttons. This stunner comes with a single clasp that’s just as chic as other jackets.

The Affordable Hero

Dolan Left Coast Faux-Suede Boyfriend Blazer Jacket

Your search for a really good faux suede option stops here. This boyfriend blazer has the cool-girl structure that we love in a timeless chocolate hue.

Customer review: “So happy this jacket is in my closet! It’s soft and the color is to die for. The easiest thing to throw on and look like a fall queen. I paired it with a white tank, black shorts, and black knee-high Western-inspired boots and got endless compliments. Get it!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Investment-Worthy Find

Weekend Max Mara Oversized Suede Jacket

If everyday elegance is what you’re after, Weekend Max Mara nails it with a drop-shoulder blazer. The luxe suede is made from 100 percent goat leather and will be the hero in your fall and winter wardrobe.

The Dressy Details

Generation Love Arielle Vegan Suede Blazer

Want a little ritz and glitz? Generation Love topped off its suede blazer with gold-trimmed buttons for a touch of glam.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Belted Beauty

& Other Stories Belted Suede Jacket

With it’s cropped finish and dramatically long belt, this suede jacket will make a statement in any closet.

The Boxy Silhouette

L’Agence Aimee Relaxed Fit Double Breasted Suede Blazer

That borrowed from the boys, oversized look is still going strong, and L’Agence has mastered it with this brown suede blazer. Balance out the roomy fit with a pair of body-hugging leggings or straight-leg jeans.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Short & Sweet

Massimo Dutti Short Suede Leather Jacket With Pocket Details

One of the biggest trends in tops is this slightly shortened silhouette that stops right at the hips. Massimo Dutti proved how chic the cropped length can be with its take on the suede jacket.

The Ladylike Jacket

Reformation Veda Reed Leather Jacket

No collar? No problem. Forget the lapel and grab this ladylike silhouette to wear with your favorite jeans, skirts, and trousers.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Oversized Coolness

Ducie Magda Suede Jacket

While it’s not exactly a blazer, you can’t deny the coolness of Ducie’s oversized jacket. Zoom in and you’ll see that the tough leather collar offers a chic contrast next to the smooth suede sleeves, like a chic take on the season’s other outerwear piece of the moment: the barn jacket.

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.

Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
